name: ORD_PRFLST_TRK
description: Tracking info for orders coming from a preference list or order template.  For Beacon, the column ORDER_TEMPLATE_ID is used, which is the unique ID of the order template in the patient's treatment plan used to create the order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ORDER_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order template (OTP) in the patient's treatment plan that was used to create the order.

columns.name: MOD_FROM_OTL_YN
columns.description: Flag whether this order is modified from its order template.
